title: Primary Password

I have several email addresses in my T-bird account but my primary address is sorokespso@outlook.com. I don't know where it came up with pennysorokes@gmail.com. Please help cuz I HATE Outlook and miss my T-bird!

title: Email Links
content: I am using MX-Linux (mx-23). When I used to click on a link in an email, I was taken to Firefox where the link was opened in a tab for viewing. Now, I have to manually switch to Firefox using CTRL-F2 (F2 is location of the workspace where I have Firefox).

title: Lost folder
content: Another lost folder story. I have computer backups going back for 6 months so I can reinstall my lost profile which has the lost folder. My question is how do I extract that folder from my profile from the back up so that when I reinstall my current profile I can add (or whatever) the lost folder?
creator: keithinoz1

title: Comcast Email Settings
content:
I have been trying to get my Comcast email configured for days with no luck. When I try to log in using my Comcast password I get a screen that shows "Access Denied You don't have permission to access "http://login.xfinity.com/login" on this server. Reference #18.321c2e17.1727662977.283cff2b https://errors.edgesuite.net/18.321c2e17.1727662977.283cff2b. I have allowed access to third party apps on my Comcast account and I am able to access my email on the Comcast website with no problem. I saw something about disabling IPV6 but it said to go to Preferences or Options in the Settings menu. My version of Thunderbird (latest) doesn't have these menu options. I have tried various IMAP and SMTP Port settings I found on the internet and nothing works.

What are the settings for Comcast email in Thunderbird?
creator: jwhorvath

title: Contents of message pane disappears
content: More than once, the contents of my message pane has suddenly gone blank. one minute I was viewing each email in the message pane beside it like normal, the next minute, the message pane was blank. From one time to the next, I can't remember how I restored it. It just happened again. I tried restarting (which I believe worked in the past) but no luck. I think what caused the problem this time -- and possibly last time too -- is clicking on a link in a particular message from a specific sender, linking to a document found inside a password-protected portal. I just want my message pane back! (and to prevent this from happening again if possible). What do I need to do?
creator: karlab31

title: How do I get to see what Thunderbird looks like in action. Ioneve used many other email programs just not this one
content: I would just like to have a sample run through of your email program thunderbird is that possible i'd like to compare it to what I know

title: Separator line after email signature
content:
Hi All,

Recently there has been so much of space coming in after the email signature of every reply or forward I do (before the email separator line). Can you please advise how can I remove it. Happened with the latest thunderbird update.

Regards,

LS
creator: lsingh

title: Removed CALdav addon, then no google birthdays
content:
128.2.3esr 64bit on Ubuntu Linux (24.04)

I had the provider plugin for google calendar and lightning working for years now.

But then some appointments could not be closed. So I did the search on this site and the solution was to remove the add-on and use the internal calendar function.

I did that and connected with my google account to have my calendar events back. But that left out all my contacts birthdays.

How do I get them (the birthdays out of my google contacts) back into Thunderbird?

Search brought something up about installing a plugin for the birthdays, but since I had to remove a plugin to have things working nearly as they should, I did not go the road to install a plugin after removing one.

Installed plugins now: Mail Merge No Message Pane Sort

Thanks in advance for trying to help!
creator: rev3

title: can't (de-)select all ics events
content:
In thunderbird/calendar, when I select import, and get the import tool and select a file to upload, I get a list of candidate events, all are initially selected.

There's a search field and two buttons on that row, select all, deselect all.

Depressing "deselect all" deselects only the last item. Adding a search in the search field doesn't change that.
creator: tmellman

title: recupero pec
content: Non a ritrovare la precedente conversazione con la quale mi avete aiutato a recurare le mie PEC. Sono riuscito a rexcuperarle quasi tutte ed ho poi chiuso Thunderbird ed infine il PC (ricordo win 7 64bit). Al mio riavvio di stamattina, pur avendo verificato che la cartella di archiviazione e' esistente e completa, all'avvio di Thunderbird questi si comporta come fosse la prima installazione e non fosse configurato in alcun modo. Trovo che esiste ancora il file profiles.ini con il corretto indirizzamento alla cartella di archivizione. Cosa e' dunque andato ancora perso? Potete essermi di aiuto? Grazie Luciano SACCA'
creator: studiolucianosacca

title: unreadable emails (in XML?)
content:
Lately I'm receiving all new emails in Thunderbird in an unreadable format.

In my webmail they're prefectly readable, but imported in Thunderbird the texts get blurred and messed-up.

I would really appreciate some help on this, so I can read what senders have written. Thanks!

Marc

Update: problem solved! 'Repair folder' did the trick.
